function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Photographing signs related to COVID-19 inside retail establishments may increase the risk of exposure to the virus for the person taking the photographs.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of contracting COVID-19 due to close proximity to potentially infected areas.","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE) such as masks, gloves, and maintaining a safe distance while taking photographs.","Technologies":"Contactless thermometers, UV disinfection devices for equipment and PPE.","People":"Researchers, photographers, individuals taking the photographs.","Owner":"Researchers, individuals taking the photographs."},{"Description":"Frequent visits to grocery stores, pharmacies, and restaurants may increase the risk of exposure to COVID-19 due to potential contact with infected individuals or contaminated surfaces.","Impact":"Possible contraction and spread of COVID-19 within the community.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to social distancing guidelines, use of PPE, frequent hand hygiene, and avoiding crowded places.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, mobile ordering and delivery apps to minimize physical visits.","People":"Researchers, individuals visiting the stores and restaurants.","Owner":"Researchers, individuals visiting the stores and restaurants."},{"Description":"Classification of various establishments as 'retailers' may overlook specific risks associated with different types of businesses, such as healthcare facilities and personal care services.","Impact":"Failure to address unique risk factors in healthcare and personal care settings.","Mitigation":"Conduct separate risk assessments for healthcare facilities, personal care services, and other specific business categories. Implement tailored safety measures based on the nature of the business.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, virtual consultation tools for healthcare services, and online appointment scheduling for personal care services.","People":"Healthcare workers, service providers, customers of healthcare and personal care establishments.","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, service providers, business owners."}]}
